name: The nightmare of introverts
description:
The aim of the game is to try and dodge all the pumpkins and survive for the longest. 

The story is about a social-anxiety zombie invited to a Halloween party, and when she reached the scene, there's a house full of pumpkins.
She's anxious and wanted to escape but the pumpkins are very enthuasiastic, no matter where she goes, they will circle around her.
She has to hop her way out.
